original_text: And they set them up Micah's graven image, which he made, all the time that the house of God was in Shiloh.
korean_text: 하나님의 집이 실로에 있을 동안에 미가가 만든 바 새긴 신상이 단 자손에게 있었더라

sentences.original_text: And they set them up Micah's graven image
all the time that the house of God was in Shiloh
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 집이 실로에 있던 모든 시간 동안
